text.name: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?
You need wood piles to repair this boat.
You need a duct tape to repair this boat.
You can repair this boat with the wood piles you have.
You can repair this boat with the duct tape you have.
Boat is repaired, are you ready to move to the next island? You will be unable to come back.
Supplies will be dropped after the video ad.
‚ÄúHello, do you want to exchange some items? This is what I offer:‚Äù
Box may include anything, from food to guns.
Billy "Red" Unlock Requirement : Kill 5 zombies with any shotgun. Difficulty Requirement : -
Emilio "Doc" Unlock Requirement : Stop bleeding 6 times. Difficulty Requirement : -
Dave "Boxer" Unlock Requirement : Kill 10 zombies with bare hands. Difficulty Requirement : -
Lee "Maniac" Unlock Requirement : Kill a bandit survivor with any axe. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher
Sergey "Slav" Unlock Requirement : Kill 3 other survivors in one run. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher
John "Biker" Unlock Requirement : Carry a rider jacket, a moto helmet and a pipe wrench all at once. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher
Ganzo "Dragon" Unlock Requirement : Kill 4 enemy survivors armed with a firearm. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher
Tom "Survivor" Unlock Requirement : Survive for 7 days. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher
Garry "Veteran" Unlock Requirement : Carry a gorka set (gorka pants, gorka jacket, gorka helmet) in a single run. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher
Survivor 1 Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt Unlocked Perks : None
Survivor 2 Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt Unlocked Perks : None
Survivor 3 Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt Unlocked Perks : None
Billy "Red" Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt, bandana Unlocked Perks : Sharpshooter
Emilio "Doc" Starting Gear : paramedic pants, t-shirt, prof. IV kit Unlocked Perks : -
Dave "Boxer" Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt, rags Unlocked Perks : Blocker
Lee "Maniac" Starting Gear : jeans, dress, gasmask, butcher knife Unlocked Perks : Sweet home
John "Biker" Starting Gear : jeans, rider jacket, moto helmet, pipe wrench Unlocked Perks : - Special Quirks : All motorcycle helmets you find have increased durability.
Sergey "Slav" Starting Gear : tracksuit pants, tracksuit jacket, balaclava, baseball bat Unlocked Perks : Puncher Special Quirks : Permanent temperature increase by +1.

Ganzo "Dragon" Starting Gear : hunter pants, improvised bow, crafted arrow x1, katana Unlocked Perks : Snowborn. Special Quirks : All katanas you find have increased durability,you move faster while holding one.
Tom "Survivor" Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt, cowboy hat, hunter knife, improvised sling bag, tailor's kit Unlocked Perks : Hunter, Survivalist
Garry "Veteran" Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt, cap, bulletproof vest, colt 1911, .45 ACP ammo x14 Unlocked Perks : Sharpshooter, Scout
No connection to the airdrop center! Please restore your internet connection.
The secret to being a man
Use 1/2/3 blood bags or saline bags
Kill 5/15/30 infected with an assault rifle or an SMG
Kill 5/15/30 infected with a bow or a crossbow
Kill 5/15/30 infected with a semi-auto or a bolt action rifle
Visit at least one city on 1/2/3 islands (levels)
Equip a full set of protective clothing and a gas mask
Kill all types of elite infected on ‚ÄúHell‚Äù difficulty

You can fight in melee with bare hands or with melee weapons. Melee fight proceeds automatically when you are close to an enemy. Each weapon has a different chance to cause triple damage or a chance to block an enemy attack.
With ranged weapons, aiming takes place automatically. Shoot by using the button. Shooting while running is less accurate than while standing.
The fireplace provides heat, light and a cooking possibility. It can be used up to three times once built.
You can grow plants which will provide you with food. You need seeds and a shovel, pitchfork or pickaxe to plant.
You‚Äôll need resources for crafting. You can find or gather them.
When you‚Äôre injured, you can start bleeding. You can‚Äôt regenerate while bleeding and you constantly lose blood. Use bandages or rags to stop the bleeding.

You can catch a disease if your temperature drops to 0% or, in rare cases, if you‚Äôre attacked by infected. You can‚Äôt regenerate while diseased. To cure the disease, use tetracycline or maintain your temperature, food and water statuses over 75%.
Cold weather can bring your temperature down. During the night, rain or snow, the temperature decreases even more.
You need to eat and drink to survive. Check the status bars for your hunger and thirst. If they drop under 50%, you can't regenerate your blood status bar.
If blood drops to zero, you die. You can lose blood from being attacked in melee or from being hit by bullets. You'll also start losing blood if your heat/water/food drops to zero.
You can stop bleeding with bandages or rags (some clothes can be torn into rags).
Use blood bags and saline bags to restore blood.
If your water, food and heat are all over 50%, you will start regenerating blood.
Hide inside buildings to warm up.
Find warm clothing in a good condition to warm up.
Start a campfire to warm up.
Find a tent and deploy it to hide inside from the rain and to warm up a little.
Most of the loot can be found in buildings.
Loot can also be found in car trunks.
You can find edible berries on some bushes.
You can chop down trees with an axe. Different types of trees provide different resources. All other useful items can be found in the world.
Find a headlamp or night vision goggles to illuminate the night (requires batteries).
Flares can illuminate a small area for a brief period after they‚Äôre thrown.
The fireplace can also illuminate an area for a longer period during the night.
Water pumps may contain water for drinking. You can drink from them, but keep in mind water is limited.
You can also fill bottles and canteens from water pumps.
Duct tape adds 15% condition to some gear.
Sewing kit adds 50% condition to some gear.
Cleaning kit adds 25% condition to your firearm.
You can find deer near water or in forests. They‚Äôre wary so you need a ranged weapon to hunt them.
If you shoot a deer you can flay it with a knife to get meat steaks.
Meat steaks can be cooked with a fireplace.
Rope + Burlap sack = improvised bag (3 slots)
Improvised bag + 3 wooden sticks = improvised backpack (5 slots)
Wood piles + rags/wooden sticks/papers = fireplace kit
Place a fireplace kit on the ground and light it with matches.
Map will be available after the tutorial.

Boat can be used to move to the current island to a next one. It has to be repaired first (wooden piles or duct tape). There are multiple islands to visit, but beware! Once you get to another island you can't return to the previous one.
Civilian tents can be deployed and used to warm up and store items. Items are stored there permanently.
Crafted fences(Wood piles + Sticks x5) and barbwires can slowdown enemies in case of attack.
Sharpshooter lvl 1: Increases chance to make a headshot with ranged weapon by 10%. lvl 2: Increases headshot damage by 10%.
Scout lvl 1: You can spot other survivors from a greater distance. lvl 2: You can detect hostility of other survivors.
Sprinter lvl 1: Movement speed increased on 5% lvl 2: Movement speed increased on 10%
Camel lvl 1: Thirst rate decreases by 10%. lvl 2: All canned drinks gives additionaly +10 Water.
Hamster lvl 1: Hunger rate decreases by 10%. lvl 2: All canned goods gives additionaly +10 Food.
Snowborn lvl 1: Raining and snowing drains heat 50% slower. lvl 2: You got +2 heat constantly.
Bullet Farmer lvl 1: All found weapons will contain at least one bullet. lvl 2: All ammo stacks you found will contain 5 more bullets.
Survivalist lvl 1: Regeneration speed doubles if your blood drops under 50%. lvl 2: You get +10% movement speed if your blood drops under 20%.
Blocker lvl 1: Increases chance to block enemy attacks in melee fight by 5%. lvl 2: Increases chance to block enemy attacks in melee fight by 15%.
Puncher lvl 1: Increases chance to deal critical hits in melee fight by 10%. lvl 2: Increases critical hit damage in melee fight by 30%.
Trunk Digger lvl 1: +20% chance to find loot in car trunks. lvl 2: Adds 10% chance to find 2 items in car trunks.
Hunter lvl 1: Animals have a smaller chance to spot you. lvl 2: You get 50% chance to get additional steak when skinning animals and can flay a deer for its skin.
Sweet home lvl 1: Staying inside buildings adds 50% more heat. lvl 2: When sleeping you hunger and thirst slowers by 30%.
Red+ lvl 1: Lowers the blood loss when bleeding by 50%. lvl 2: Bleeding stops 2 times faster.
Vigilance Lv 1: You can better spot camouflaged enemies. Lv 2: Bushes with berries and pillboxes near you are marked on the map.
Agronomist lvl 1: You get 50% chance to get more berries when gathering wild berries. lvl 2: You get 50% chance to get more vegerables when gathering your plants.
Repair this boat with wood piles to move further. Chop any tree with an axe to get wood piles.
Hey! This looks like some loot! Move closer to pick it up.
Here you can check all your items you picked up.
This is your hands slot, it is always available, even if you have no other gear. Use items by tapping.
Welcome, survivor. You are trapped on a small island, and your only chance to get to another one is to find a boat.
Choose the movement controls mode. You can switch between them anytime.
As long as you keep surviving and killing enemies, you will obtain experience points (XP) to unlock perks.
Choose one perk and tap on the plus button. It will always be active until your character dies.
Use the interact button to pick up items and interact.
Now you have a ranged weapon, aiming happens automatically. Use this button to shoot.
You can reload your weapon by tapping this button. If you have suitable ammo, it will be loaded.
Switch between melee and ranged weapons mode.
It looks like you‚Äôre bleeding. Find a bandage or tear your t-shirt into rags.
Your blood level dropped to zero. Lucky for you it is only a tutorial and you will be healed now. Go on.
Use drag and drop to manage items in the inventory.
Look, that‚Äôs a firearm. It can usually be found on military locations.
Infected ahead! Attack it by moving closer. The fight will proceed automatically.
Wolves! Keep quiet, wolves are pretty dangerous, especially in packs.
A water pump. You can drink from it and fill up your canteen or water bottle.
An abandoned car. You can check the trunk for loot. Move closer to the back of the car to do so.
You can hunt deer and flay them with a knife to get meat.
You can hunt rabbits and flay them with a knife to get meat.
You can gather berries from some bushes, just look around.
You can fuel this boat with the gas canister you have.
You need a gas canister to fuel this boat.
Enter this bunker? You will be able to get back.
Leave this bunker? You will be able to get back later.
Watch the ad to wake up.
You are about to die. Your only chance to continue playing is using this adrenaline injection after watching the video ad.
You need internet connection to proceed.
Optic scopes - reduce spread, and increase headshot chance
Hides muzzle flash and removes shot noise.
Kate "Tourist" Starting Gear : jeans, raincoat, civilian tent, headlamp, battery Unlocked Perks : Lvl.1 Hunter, Lvl.1 Vigilance
Jasmine "Lumber" Starting Gear : hunter pants, t-shirt, beret, hatchet, duct tape Unlocked Perks : Lvl.1 Hamster, Lvl.1 Camel, Lvl.1 Snowborn
Aika "Stringer" Starting Gear : jeans, t-shirt, cap, press vest, canteen, radio Unlocked Perks : Lvl.1 Scout
Kate "Tourist" Unlock Requirement : Find two different drivable vehicles on the 4th island or later. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher difficulty.
Jasmine "Lumber" Unlock Requirement : Drop your karma to -100 and then rise it to +100 in a single run. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher difficulty.
Aika "Stringer" Unlock Requirement : Complete 3 tasks from survivors in one run. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher difficulty.
Hello there! Our group is looking for
As a reward you will get
Thanks a lot! Here you go, the coordinates of your reward.
No active task at this moment.
Coordinates where a drivable vehicle is located.
Coordinates of an underground bunker entrance.
A group of survivors is looking for this item:
Hey, we need help! A group of bandits set up a camp not far from here. Eliminate them and we will reward you.
Did you find what we are looking for?
Coordinates of a boat we saw on the east coast.
Hey! We got ambushed and lost our loot case. If you bring it back to us, we will reward you.
Take care of the bandits first, come back then.
Did you find our loot case?
Thanks a lot! Here are the coordinates of your reward.
A group of survivors has lost their loot case. I can find it and bring it back, or I can open it and steal all the stuff.
A group of survivors asked me to deal with bandits.
Bandits eliminated. I need to get back to survivors for my reward.
MAC-10 Unlock Requirement : Kill 200 infected in total with any pistols. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher difficulty. Current Status:
Saiga-12k Unlock Requirement: Kill 150 infected in total with any shotguns. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher difficulty. Current Status:
AUG Unlock Requirement: Kill 200 infected in total with any full-auto weapon or SMG. Difficulty Requirement : "Regular" or higher difficulty. Current Status:
MAC-10 Unlocked. Spawn Locations : Gun shops, NATO vehicles crash sites, Underground bunkers.
Saiga-12k Unlocked. Spawn Locations : Gun shops, Underground bunkers, EAST Military bases.
AUG Unlocked. Spawn Locations : NATO vehicles crash sites, Underground bunkers, NATO Military bases.
VSS Unlock Requirement : Find 6 helicopter crashes in one run. Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher difficulty. Current Status:
VSS Unlocked. Spawn Locations : Underground bunkers, EAST Military bases.
SV-98 Unlock Requirement : Make 200 headshot kills to infecteds with rifles. (Mosin Nagant, SKS ,SVD, Repeater). Difficulty Requirement : "Veteran" or higher difficulty. Current Status:
SV-98 Unlocked. Spawn Locations : Underground bunkers.
Call friendly survivor for help? He will arrive right after the video ad.
Push this button when ready for next wave.
Area clear, supply drop in your area.
‚Ä¢Holiday zombies appear on snowy days ‚Ä¢New - Christmas Hat ‚Ä¢ New - Christmas Gift
‚Ä¢Functional Equivalence Exchange ‚Ä¢Allows you to exchange elements of the same type with each other.
‚Ä¢Function - Material saving ‚Ä¢Additional capacity +6 ‚Ä¢You are allowed to carry over your content to the next game saved
‚Ä¢Function ‚Äì build mode ‚Ä¢Allows you to unconditionally store all deployable builds
‚Ä¢Function ‚Äì Storage of experiences ‚Ä¢Allows you to use accumulated experience to exchange for materials
‚Ä¢ Weapons, equipment and vehicles will not be damaged ‚Ä¢ (Survival experience may be reduced after unlocking)
‚Ä¢ Life limit has been doubled ‚Ä¢ The maximum satiety and hydration limit has been doubled
‚Ä¢ Resurrected on the West Coast after death
‚Ä¢ Hidden bio blood bars ‚Ä¢ The number of infected people has increased significantly
‚Ä¢ Infected people will get stronger every day and will reach the maximum limit after 30 days ‚Ä¢ (In elite infected, blood volume will no longer increase)
‚Ä¢ You will feel tired if you don‚Äôt sleep at night ‚Ä¢ The blood moon appears every 7 days ‚Ä¢ During the blood moon, You will be noticed by all infected
‚Ä¢NPCs with automatic weapons will fire continuously
‚Ä¢Achievements cannot be unlocked in special modes

To unlock achievements you must play an entire game until your character dies. There are 3 different levels: bronze with the Newbie, silver with the Normal and gold with the Veteran. You can unlock lower levels by selecting a higher difficulty, but not vice versa. Higher levels are also more difficult to unlock.
Are you sure you want to exit the game? Tutorial progress will not be saved.
Are you sure you want to leave? Your game will be saved.
Rabbit Just a regular rabbit, will try to run out of any creature's sight if notices them. Very fast. HP: 5
Deer Just a regular deer, will try to run out of any creature's sight if notices them. Not as fast as it thinks it is. HP: 80
Albino Deer An extremely rare mutated deer. Its dazzling fur is whiter than snow. HP: 80
Wolf A very dangerous creature that never travels alone. HP: 50
Chicken Not so long ago they were mainly domestic creatures, but now they jus tcontinue living on their own. HP: 5
Dog The only one you can trust nowadays. Will protect you and attack your enemies. HP: 0
Infected Not so long ago they were regular people, but now the only thing they want is to tear every living creature to pieces. HP: 60 Special skills: None.
Virus made this infected an absolute beast, fast enough to overrun any survivor HP: 80. Special skills: Fast movement speed.

A stealthy one It is not as active as other infected as it'll only attack you once you get close enough or a screamer shouts at you. Can deal a lot of troubles to an unsuspecting survivor. HP: 60 Special skills: Lies on the ground facing down and gets barely visible (gets a red tracer if you have learnt a special in-game skill).
Infected soldier An infected soldier. It is much stronger than any regular infected thanks to having body armour and tougher body. HP: 100 Special skills: None.

Yellow-suited infected scientist A disgusting creature. At the start of the apocalypse a lot of boilogy scientists were mobilized to study the infection and hopefully find a cure for it... Although they've probably just made everything even worse. Its suit is filled with toxic green substance. HP: 80 Special skills: after it dies, some of substance flows out of its suit, making you sick if contacted with unless you have hazmat boots.

Red-suited infected scientist A disgusting creature. At the start of the apocalypse a lot of boilogy scientists were mobilized to study the infection and hopefully find a cure for it... Although they've probably just made everything even worse. Its suit is filled with toxic green substance.It is much faster and stronger than yellow-suited ones. HP: 120 Special skills: Higher speed and HP compared to yellow-suited infected. Leaves a trail of toxic sobstance when moves and splashes it around after its death.

Screamer After mutating this infected's vocal chords got much stronger than any human could've ever had. It is not as agressive as other infected are, instead of that it just shouts at whoever gets in its sight marking that creature and making each and every infected attack this marked one. HP: 50 Special skills: A very loud scream makes every infected attack the player or any other person.

Infected militiaman Even though he's biologically dead by now, he still knows how to shoot and reload his handgun. Although he's not as accurate as he was someday, he still can and will deal a lot of troubles to an unsuspecting survivor HP: 100 Special skills: A freackin' handgun!

Infected officer Before the apocalypse he was a highly skilled an ranked officer that had acces to military grade bunkers. Still remembers how to shoot and kill and there's no doubt he'll gladly show it to any survivor. HP: 120 Special skills: A freakin' handgun(!) and a bunker keycard.

Heavily-armoured infected soldier. An infected soldier equipped with an automatic gun and heavy bodyarmour. Although he's not very accurate, it's compensated with high rate of fire and a much bigger healthbar. Maybe his equipment didn't help him while he was still alive, but it's still enough to shred to pieces any survivior who was unlucky enough to meet him face to face. HP: 250 Special skills: A freakin' fully-automatic gun!

Jumper Virus made this trained soldier's feet as flexible and strong as suspension springs, allowing it to jump and run better than any pre-apocalypse athlete. HP: 150 Special skills: Damage dealing vertical jump.

Spitter An infected soldier in a hazmat suit. Some soldiers were equipped with hazmat suits and sent by the military to assist scientists in their work, looks like they didn't do their job very good. Instead of just hitting you until you die they spit in your side with a lot of toxic green substance that deals damage and applies "sickness" status effect on contact. HP: 100 Special skills: Spitting toxic substance.

Athlete Was a strong and durable sportsman before the apocalypse and virus only made him more dangerous. Runs fast, hits hard and is very annoying as he can dodge your bullets unless the distance in dangeroulsy low. HP: 100 Special skills: High speed and an ability to dodge bullets.

Infected Spetsnaz soldier Was a trained military specialist before the apocalypse that could and still can kill any enemy, the only difference is that his only enemy is now humanity. Runs fast, hits hard, has a lot of HP and is very annoying as he can dodge your bullets unless the distance in dangeroulsy low. HP: 120 Special skills: High speed and an ability to dodge bullets.

Gorka infected soldier. An infected soldier equipped with an automatic gun and Gorka armour. Although he's not very accurate, it's compensated with high rate of fire and a much bigger healthbar. Maybe his equipment didn't help him while he was still alive, but it's still enough to shred to pieces any survivior who was unlucky enough to meet him face to face. HP: 175 Special skills: A freakin' fully-automatic gun!

Heavily-armoured anti-rioteer A well-equipped infected that was a soldier of the special riot-dispersal unit. his armour was made to withstand a lot of hits and although it didn't quite help him when he was still alive, he still can easily get you killed. HP: 1000 Special skills: None.

[Only spawns on legendary dificulty level] Radioactive hazmat soldier Nice suit didn't save it from dying, and spending some time in highly-radioactive zone made it even more dangerous. HP: 1200 Special skills: High speed and poisonous attacks.

[Only spawns on legendary dificulty level] Plague scientist A researcher that was experimenting with mutated genome and used it on themselves, well, let's just say that it wasn't their brightest idea. Very strong and fast, poisons and disarms player when attacks, explodes with toxic substance on death. HP: 2000 Special skills: Ingores block,poisonous attacks, disarming attacks, spawns poisonous toxic substance upon dying.

Tank Extremely strong mutated infected. Nobody knows how or when this monstrosity was made because everyone who tried to study it was killed in mere seconds. Deals tons of damage, moves almost as fast as a car and is almost impossible to kill. HP: 2500 (not legendary)/5000(legendary) Special skills: High damage, ignores block, runup attack, throwing rocks, disarming attacks.

[exlusive for special holiday edition] Snowman This infected doesn't know who or how wrapped them in Christmas lights, but seems like they like it! It looks like infected still like to have holidays. HP: 50 Special skills: A very loud scream makes every infected attack the player or any other person.

Survivors Neutrals: Won't attack you and are willing to trade with player unless you have low karma. Lone hooligans: Will attack you, some of them have guns. Friendlies: Friendly survivors will join your squad unless you have low karma. HP: 100.
Murky bandits Dangerous and well-equipped thugs that will attack anyone who comes too close. Usually have nice guns and armour. HP: 110
Murky bandits leader The leader of murky bandits, have the best equipment out of them. Drops unique black Gorka helmet. HP: 250
